item.description:
Turning the Key: Market Update

As an accomplished investor, real estate agent, and real estate broker, David Offutt has a firm grip on the pulse of the market, and sees what's going on through a wide variety of lenses. In September, he'll be joining us at Turning the Key to share his views on the current marketplace.

David will discuss the uniqueness of this particular market and why it differs from others you may be familiar with, the changes he's observing (and a few he's predicting!), and what you need to know to succeed in the current market!

Topics will include:

* A "State of the Union" type review of the current marketplace conditions
* Predictions for where the market is headed - and why
* Things you can (and should) expect when working with a good agent
* How to win the homeowner's trust - and have them falling all over themselves to work with you
* What you should be doing right now to use the current conditions to your advantage

Join us for an evening of education and networking, and let David outline the current market conditions "familiar and otherwise" and share his predictions of where it's headed, and what you need to do to safely navigate the marketplace as you prosper!

Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key: Market Update
